Articles.Content:
I have Kerbal space program 0.21.1 and I was using the new SAS for control surfaces on planes and it worked perfectly until I installed B9 aerospace. When I activate the SAS on a plane the control surfaces will oscillate a little at first and then they will gradually get to these really wild spazzy oscillations over the course of 15 seconds or so.

I have tried it without B9 aerospace and it works fine so I know it is B9 that is the problem. I have tried it with the stock parts that come with the game and the B9 parts. It does it for both. I would really like to know if there is a fix for this or if it only happens for me?

List of mods I have installed:

B9 aerospace

Nova punch

Ferram aerospace research

Editor extensions

Service module part

Procedural fairings and wings

Space junk bay

Alchemy technology truss pack

Modular multiwheels (Turn better than normal landing gear.)

Edited July 29, 2013 by novahike999
Forgot some information about mods.

It ain't B9, it's FAR mate.

Oh, I was certian it was B9. Do you know how to fix it. Any help would be appreciated.

I have the same problem and it is NOT FAR .. I had FAR till yestarday and had no problem, I added the new B9 and it started oscillating... It is the B9. I would liek to know as well if there is a workaround.

I have the same problem and it is NOT FAR .. I had FAR till yestarday and had no problem, I added the new B9 and it started oscillating... It is the B9. I would liek to know as well if there is a workaround.

Well, it's nice to know that I'm not the only one who is getting this problem. I don't think I'll bother asking the dev because it's a problem with the mod, not just for me so I'm sure there will be plenty of other people doing that.
maybe mention it at the b9 mod thread
